name: Random-notes
tagline: Random notes about my job as a full-stack programmer, sysadmin, devop, IT.
body:
### Welcome to my random notes
I will try to write here some random notes about tasks I find useful and fun, doing it in a generic way (or as generic as possible) so others can use it too.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
